If you have had issues, in the past, sending messages from your tablet, the web, or the chrome app/extension, please do the following:
1. On your phone, go to "My Account", then "Delete Account"
2. Clear the app data from your system's settings
3. Open up the phone and go through the setup process again (you can use the same email.)
You will have to log in again on all your devices if you do this.
